title: Metal Bastard's Best of 2012
description:
Two massive mixes containing track from Metal Bastard's favorite albums of 2012.

Originally posted on the now-defunct blogs Metal Bastard and Metal Bastard Goes Soft. Nowadays check metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com for all of your music needs.
